name: Earthshatter Boots
tooltip:
Earthshatter BootsLevel 60

Rimblat Earthshatter at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Earthshatter Boots if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Boots, 12 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 3 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Boots
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 12
- Arcanite Bar
- Nexus Crystal x 3
